resources.string: Allow app to gather smoking habit data for one week before starting your program?
Average number of cigarettes smoked daily:
Number of days you\'d like to quit in:
Average number of hours you\'re awake in a day:
Tap here to add/remove/edit reminders that will display if you deviate from your quitting plan.

Quiting smoking is challenging. When you\'re tempted to deviate from your quiting plan, Kick the Habit will display a helpful reminder to encourage you to stay on track. You can configure up to 10 custom \"reasons to quit\" below which will be randomly displayed if you\'re going to smoke before you should.
